text:
HI Everyone,
I’m new in developing in HubSpot.
I am confused by the documentation below
```When creating a new company, you should include at least one of the following properties in your request: name or domain. It is recommended to always include domain, because domain names are the primary unique identifier  to avoid duplicate companies in HubSpot. ```
because both allow duplicates.
And the setting owner is HubSpot and I don’t have permission
If anyone knows please let me know

Hie everyone,
Can we have google maps api integrated with HubSpot forms field for auto address generation?
Is anyone having any idea related to this?
Thanks <@U2H3TT8F2>

Hello, which API endpoint are you using to create a company? Forms API will function as upsert. So, if the matching company domain exists, it will update that record and not create a duplicate. Hope that helps!
Hi, I think an approach to this would be to have a custom form w/ Google Maps api to auto generate the address. Then, pass the data to HubSpot via the forms API.

```POST
/crm/v3/objects/companies```
<https://developers.HubSpot.jp/docs/api/crm/companies#:~:text=%E7%A2%BA%E8%AA%8D%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84%E3%80%82-,%E4%BC%9A%E7%A4%BE%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89%E3%82%92%E4%BD%9C%E6%88%90%E3%81%99%E3%82%8B,-%E6%96%B0%E3%81%97%E3%81%84%E4%BC%9A%E7%A4%BE%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89|https://developers.HubSpot.jp/docs/api/crm/companies#:~:text=%E7%A2%BA%E8%AA%8D%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E[…]A%E7%A4%BE%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89>

this endpoint!
Hi everyone, does anyone know how to get the last updated property in any contact using the HubSpot API?

会社名 = name
会社のドメイン名 = domain

You mean, that single property value for every contact in the CRM?
Maybe use Search  from Contact API
Also you could have it inside a custom tab with CRM Develpment tools
Do you want it to duplicate? If not, I'd switch to forms api and it'll prevent that from happening.
Hi - Is there a way I can submit a HubSpot form after 5 seconds?
hey everyone. Is there anywhere I can find a list of all filterable properties for the search api?

Hello,
I’m trying to understand how the `Original Source` thing is set in Contact object.

I have a SPA application using own forms - I have the same forms reflected in HubSpot. Forms in the app are submitted to my API, then it’s data is formatted, and sent to HubSpot api. Along with Post info, API is sending context object (`HubSpotuk` cookie, page url, page title etc.). This process adds submissions to form on HubSpot and contact is created but Original Source is still incorrect. Anyone can help?
How would I implement this I'm pulling in the shared script HubSpot form into my module? <script> hbspt.form.create ({ poralId: "XXXXXX"; formID: XXXXXX-XXXX-XXXXX-XXXX" }); </script>

if I'm understanding correctly, you are looking to target whatever form is being used?
if that's so you can target the generic HubSpot form id which always starts with a "hsForm_" followed by the form ID
so something like `const hsForm = document.querySelector('form[id^="hsForm_"]');`

Hi - I have a HubSpot form in which email=<mailto:xx@xx.com|xx@xx.com> is being pulled into the email field from a url parameter and I need to have it auto submit or have it submitted after 5 seconds. I'm so new to HubSpot forms and api, I'm unsure how to implement this correctly in my module,

thanks you!
I want to see forms api document!
i don’t want to duplicate
